subject: [Firm Name] – [Time Period] Internship for [University Name] Student
body:
Mr./Ms. [Name],

I hope you're doing well. My name is [Your Name], and I am a [Your Year / Major] at [Your University]. I'm writing to ask if there might be an internship opportunity at [Firm Name] for [Time Period].

Through my coursework and personal projects, I have developed skills in [Relevant Skill 1] and [Relevant Skill 2]. I believe these could contribute to [Firm Name]’s work in [Area].

I would love to have a brief call or conversation to explore how I can add value. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best,
[Your Name]

subject: Inquiry About Internship Opportunities
body:
Dear [Recipient’s Name],

My name is [Your Name], and I am a [Your Current Status, e.g., third-year student majoring in Computer Science]. I’ve been following [Company Name]’s work, especially [specific project or value], which really resonates with my interests in [field].

Through my academic projects and coursework, I’ve gained hands-on experience in [mention 1–2 relevant skills or tools]. I believe these skills could help contribute to [Company Name]'s ongoing work, and I would love to explore any internship openings you might have.

Would you be open to a brief conversation to discuss possible opportunities?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your University / Major]
[Your LinkedIn / Portfolio link]

[LinkedIn / Portfolio / Resume]

body:

subject: Thank You — Great Connecting with You
body:
Hi [Name],

Thank you for taking the time to chat with me today. I truly appreciated learning more about [Company Name] and your work in [area].

I’m excited about the possibility of contributing to your team, and as discussed, I’ll send over my resume / project samples. Please let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to see.

Thanks again, and I hope we can stay in touch.

Best,
[Your Name]

subject: Following Up on Internship Inquiry
body:
Hello [Name],

I just wanted to follow up on my previous email regarding internship opportunities at [Company Name]. I understand you’re busy, so I appreciate any chance to reconnect or learn more about potential roles.

Thanks again for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]

subject: Could You Help Me with a Referral at [Company Name]?
body:
Hi [Name],

Thanks so much for considering, and either way, I appreciate your time.

Best,
[Your Name]
